fields.headline: Marketing Week
fields.bodyText: The Safeway marketing director, Karen Bray, is leaving the company, which is at the centre of a takeover battle. Asda is to test market standalone stores for its George clothes brand. BT Retail has promoted its consumer marketing director, Fergus Crockett, to consumer managing director following Angus Porter's departure to Abbey National. Colin Woodstock, the marketing director of Royal Bank of Scotland-owned The One Account, is leaving his position after less than a year without a job to go to. Masterfoods is to revamp its cough sweet brand, Tunes. Leo Burnett has won the £8m Bulmers account. The Outdoor Advertising Association has handed Abbott Mead Vickers BBDO the industry's first joint initiative advertising campaign for more than 10 years.
